reviewText: these angel dics cannot be played in europe

May be the best DVD I ever purchased on Amazon.
Inspirational and miraculous.
I really like positive true stories of hope rather than so much of the violence we often see nowadays on TV.
On your worst days, this is the show to watch!  A "Faith In Humanity Restored" show for every age in the family.  It gives your heart and your hope a needed hug.  All time favorite true stories.
We're hooked; we can't stop watching episodes that are inspiring us in our own lives!
Straight forward presentation in everyday occurrences. Cause to stop and think
